events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit well. I would like to request a refund because the size chart was misleading and the jacket is too tight.
The customer's request contains keywords related to refund and return. Assigning this case to the Refund cluster for proper handling.
Customer support agent Anna has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer regarding the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear that the jacket size didn’t work out. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging to process the refund promptly?
Thanks for the quick response. My order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, tags still attached, and it’s in the original packaging.
Great, thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request. Please send the jacket back using the pre-paid return label we will email you shortly.
I appreciate your help and the quick reply. I will send the jacket back today and expect the refund once you receive it.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
